title: Ron Nagorcka
text:
Ron Nagorcka (born 1948) is an <a href="Australian">Australian</a> <a href="composer">composer</a>, <a href="didjeridu">didjeridu</a> and <a href="Keyboard%20instrument">keyboard</a> player. Nagorcka has been an important figure in the <a href="Australian%20experimental%20music">Australian experimental music</a> scene for some 40 years.
Since 1988 he has been living in <a href="Tasmania">Tasmania</a>. Based out of <a href="Tasmania">Tasmania</a>, he has been creating a large body of works for sampled bird and animal sounds, conventional instruments, and <a href="didjeridu">didjeridu</a>, in large part using complex just intonation systems.
External links.
